author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

Following the issue mentioned in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47114 as a consequence of the update of the BTL numbering scheme and ```BTLDetId``` data format in the PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46977 , the update is temporarily reverted, pending a solution that protects against the residual backward compatibility violations.

#### PR validation:

Simple revert of the PR without further developments on top of it, code compiles. It requires reverting also the data files used as references of the unit tests
title: MTD geometry: temporarily revert the BTL numbering scheme update
